summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the administration of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and amending Section 9, 11, 13, 13.1, 13.2, 13.3, 13.4, 14-A, 15, 16, 23, 58, 71, 78-B, 90-3, 95, 95-A, 95-F, 98, 107, 130, 131, 134, 135, 137, 165, 172, 173, 173.1 176.1, 196-A, 201, 207, 241, 261, 262, 303, 309, 312, and 372 thereof to transfer the power to issue licenses from the City Comptroller to the Director of Licenses and Consumer Affairs.
